controller

Class SaveGifController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.TopControl
      • controller.SaveGifController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class SaveGifController
extends TopControl
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    FXML Controller class controlling the creation of a gif from chosen Board and ruleSet.

      • sliderListeners

        public void sliderListeners()

      • sizeBoxListener

        public void sizeBoxListener()
        Selection of .gif sizes. Needed since a big boardArray needs corresponding .gif sizes when the cell size become small enough.

      • saveGif

        public void saveGif()
        Method called on Button action. Sets location of new file and calls the boardToGif-method. And then creates a .gif file on that location. Further implementation should be to add a progress bar to the process.
        See Also:
        Gif

      • sizeCheck

        public void sizeCheck()
        Checks the size of the board to create into a gif, since it needs to be adjusted according to Board size.

      • beforeGifMessage

        public void beforeGifMessage()
        Message to show before .gif file begins to run.
